concept.title: Cluster Mode
concept.shortdesc: You can run the in cluster mode to process large volumes of data from a Kafka cluster.

conbody.p: cluster modeoverviewWhen a runs in cluster mode, it runs as an application within Spark. Spark is an open source cluster-computing application that is installed as part of the Kafka CDH. Within Spark, the spawns a instance to process data from each partition in the Kafka cluster.
In cluster mode, you can preview data and monitor each in the cluster.

p.note: If you add a partition to the topic being read by the , restart the pipeline to enable the to read from the new partition.
